item.title: Zeeno - A text-based books recommendation service
item.description: Find books about topics/ideas in your head An app that lets you find books about ideas or topics you are thinking about, by simply describing them with sentences. Demo : https://zeeno.vercel.app Code: https://github.com/damilojohn/zeno Find books by describing what they are about. Contributors : Oduguwa Damilola John (Machine Learning) Makinde Damilola (Frontend Engineering) Adebowale Segun (Design) Babaoye (Design)
